channel.title: I need help portforwarding my server (317)
channel.description: ok so i need some help portforwarding my 317 server I have both hamachi and no-ip but no clue what either one does??? I would also like to add tormented demons to my server I have the models downloaded but when i got to add the ints to class8 it shows this "Êþº¾ 2D 6IJKL M N" there is a bunch more. but anyway i really want my server to be online what exactly do i have to do so that other people can download it and play it. do i need noip or hamachi do i need a dedicated server or vps or can i just host my own from my house network? if you have anyhelp it would be greatly appreciated

item.title: I need help portforwarding my server (317)
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

In more depth, you can host it off your own personal computer but it’s advised you buy a vps due to that’s what their designed to do, host things and run for long periods off time. Some good sites are:

Jaguarpc

VPSLand Aquired by JaguarPC, continues VPS Hosting ~ Jaguarpc

All VPSLand clients have been migrated to our cloud vps hosting platform. All new VPSLand orders are eligbale for our 40% off promo for new cloud vps plans.


http://www.frantech.ca

You can use no-ip or Hamachi, it’s advised you use no-ip due to it’ll be easier to gain traffic and most users are used to no-ip and not Hamachi. As posted in the above to get your server online follow this tutorial;

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

This covers portforwarding also. This topic might help you (possibly)

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Read full topic

[quote=“aerodude30, post:1, topic:365800”]ok so i need some help portforwarding my 317 server I have both hamachi and no-ip but no clue what either one does??? I would also like to add tormented demons to my server I have the models downloaded but when i got to add the ints to class8 it shows this “Êþº¾ 2D
6IJKL
M
N” there is a bunch more. but anyway i really want my server to be online what exactly do i have to do so that other people can download it and play it. do i need noip or hamachi do i need a dedicated server or vps or can i just host my own from my house network? if you have anyhelp it would be greatly appreciated[/quote]

I believe that code is byte code, i.e. compiled java, you need to edit the .Java files not the .class files. Also you might want to read this (possible again):

moparisthebest.com
